1.name: Fast Times at Ridgemont High
1.description: A group of Southern California high school students are enjoying their most important subjects: sex, drugs, and rock n' roll.

2.name: Blade Runner
2.description: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space, and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

3.name: The Thing
3.description: A research team in Antarctica is hunted by a shape-shifting alien that assumes the appearance of its victims.

4.name: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
4.description: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape Earth and return to his home world.

5.name: The Dark Crystal
5.description: On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal, and so restore order to his world.

6.name: Poltergeist
6.description: A family's home is haunted by a host of demonic ghosts.

7.name: Conan the Barbarian
7.description: A young boy, Conan, becomes a slave after his parents are killed and tribe destroyed by a savage warlord and sorcerer, Thulsa Doom. When he grows up he becomes a fearless, invincible fighter. Set free, he plots revenge against Thulsa Doom.

8.name: An Officer and a Gentleman
8.description: A young man must complete his work at a Navy Officer Candidate School to become an aviator, with the help of a tough Gunnery Sergeant and his new girlfriend.

9.name: First Blood
9.description: A veteran Green Beret is forced by a cruel Sheriff and his deputies to flee into the mountains and wage an escalating one-man war against his pursuers.

10.name: Annie
10.description: A young orphan girl's adventures in finding a family that will take her.

11.name: Grease 2
11.description: An English student at a 1960s American high school has to prove himself to the leader of a girls' gang whose members can only date greasers.

12.name: TRON
12.description: A computer hacker is abducted into the digital world and forced to participate in gladiatorial games where his only chance of escape is with the help of a heroic security program.

13.name: Sophie's Choice
13.description: Sophie is the survivor of Nazi concentration camps, who has found a reason to live with Nathan, a sparkling if unsteady American Jew obsessed with the Holocaust.

14.name: Rocky III
14.description: After winning the ultimate title and being the world champion, Rocky falls into a hole and finds himself picked up by a former enemy.

15.name: Swamp Thing
15.description: After a violent incident with a special chemical, a research scientist is turned into a swamp plant monster.

16.name: Friday the 13th Part III
16.description: Having revived from his wounds, Jason Voorhees takes refuge at a cabin near Crystal Lake. As a group of co-eds arrive for their vacation, Jason continues his killing spree.

17.name: Tootsie
17.description: Michael Dorsey, an unsuccessful actor, disguises himself as a woman in order to get a role on a trashy hospital soap.

18.name: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
18.description: With the assistance of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using the life-generating Genesis Device as the ultimate weapon.

19.name: Gandhi
19.description: Gandhi's character is fully explained as a man of nonviolence. Through his patience, he is able to drive the British out of the subcontinent. And the stubborn nature of Jinnah and his commitment towards Pakistan is portrayed.

20.name: Night Shift
20.description: A morgue attendant is talked into running a brothel at his workplace after a deceased pimp is sent there. However, the pimp's killers don't look too kindly on this new 'business', nor does the morgue's owner.

21.name: Creepshow
21.description: An anthology which tells five terrifying tales based on the E.C. horror comic books of the 1950s.

22.name: The Secret of NIMH
22.description: To save her ill son, a field mouse must seek the aid of a colony of rats, with whom she has a deeper link than she ever suspected.

23.name: 48 Hrs.
23.description: A hard-nosed cop reluctantly teams up with a wise-cracking criminal temporarily paroled to him, in order to track down a killer.

24.name: Airplane II: The Sequel
24.description: A faulty computer causes a passenger space shuttle to head straight for the Sun. Can Ted Striker save the day and get the shuttle back on track - again?

25.name: Cat People
25.description: A young woman's sexual awakening brings horror when she discovers her urges transform her into a monstrous black leopard.

26.name: Pink Floyd: The Wall
26.description: A confined but troubled rock star descends into madness in the midst of his physical and social isolation from everyone.

27.name: The Beastmaster
27.description: A sword-and-sorcery fantasy about a young man's search for revenge. Armed with supernatural powers, the handsome hero and his animal allies wage war against marauding forces.

28.name: Zapped!
28.description: A high school science nerd gains telekinetic powers after a laboratory accident and uses them for revenge upon bullies.

29.name: The King of Comedy
29.description: Rupert Pupkin is a passionate yet unsuccessful comic who craves nothing more than to be in the spotlight and to achieve this, he stalks and kidnaps his idol to take the spotlight for himself.

30.name: Halloween III: Season of the Witch
30.description: Kids all over America want Silver Shamrock masks for Halloween. Doctor Daniel Challis seeks to uncover a plot by Silver Shamrock owner Conal Cochran.

31.name: Class of 1984
31.description: A new teacher at a troubled inner-city high school soon ends up clashing with the delinquent leader of a punk posse that runs the school.

32.name: The Entity
32.description: A woman is tormented and sexually molested by an invisible demon.

33.name: Evil Under the Sun
33.description: Trying to find how a millionaire wound up with a phony diamond brings Hercule Poirot (Sir Peter Ustinov) to an exclusive island resort frequented by the rich and famous. When a murder is committed, everyone has an alibi.

34.name: The Year of Living Dangerously
34.description: A young Australian reporter tries to navigate the political turmoil of Indonesia during the rule of President Sukarno with the help of a diminutive photographer.

35.name: The Last American Virgin
35.description: The friendship of a group of young friends struggling with teen sex, drugs, and work is jeopardized by a romantic interest which may turn pals into bitter rivals.

36.name: Fitzcarraldo
36.description: The story of Brian Sweeney Fitzgerald, an extremely determined man who intends to build an opera house in the middle of a jungle.

37.name: Lo squartatore di New York
37.description: A burned-out New York police detective teams up with a college psychoanalyst to track down a vicious serial killer randomly stalking and killing various young women around the city.

38.name: Fanny och Alexander
38.description: Two young Swedish children experience the many comedies and tragedies of their family, the Ekdahls.

39.name: The Verdict
39.description: A lawyer sees the chance to salvage his career and self-respect by taking a medical malpractice case to trial rather than settling.

40.name: Forbidden World
40.description: In the distant future, a federation marshal arrives at a research lab on a remote planet where a genetic experiment has gotten loose and begins feeding on the dwindling scientific group.

41.name: The World According to Garp
41.description: A struggling young writer finds his life and work dominated by his unfaithful wife and his radical feminist mother, whose best-selling manifesto turns her into a cultural icon.

42.name: Paradise
42.description: In the Victorian period, two teenagers, David and Sarah, travel with a caravan from Baghdad to Damascus. At an oasis, the white slave agent known as the Jackal raids them, mainly to add the...                See full summary »

43.name: The Slumber Party Massacre
43.description: A high school student's slumber party turns terrifying as an escaped mental patient with a drill decides to crash the evening.

44.name: Making Love
44.description: A successful young L.A. doctor and his equally successful television-producer wife find their happily-ever-after life torn assunder when he suddenly confronts his long-repressed attraction ...                See full summary »

45.name: The Toy
45.description: An underemployed reporter finds himself literally purchased as a toy for a rich spoiled brat.

46.name: The Best Little Whorehouse in Texas
46.description: A town's Sheriff and regular patron of a historical whorehouse fights to keep it running when a television reporter targets it as the Devil's playhouse.

47.name: Q
47.description: NYPD detectives Shepard and Powell are working on a bizarre case of a ritualistic Aztec murder. Meanwhile, something big is attacking people of New York and only greedy small time crook Jimmy Quinn knows where its lair is.

48.name: Who Dares Wins
48.description: It's suspected that a peace/anti-nuke organization in UK has some extremists willing to use terrorism. The action will probably be against an embassy in London. The SAS/Special Air Service try to get the organization infiltrated.

49.name: Diner
49.description: A group of college-age buddies struggle with their imminent passage into adulthood in 1959 Baltimore.

50.name: The Last Unicorn
50.description: A brave unicorn and a magician fight an evil King who is obsessed with attempting to capture the world's unicorns.
